content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:20 pm est on 5/11/2009 i spotted a low flying orange sphere approximately 1 mile north-east of the rockville woman's prison in rockville, in.  the object moved at a fast speed across the sky before stopping, suddenly. it hovered for approximately 5 minutes before abruptly disappearing from sight.

the night in question was clear, with temps in the low 50's.
content.summary: Large glowing orange orb hovers low over field.

content.detailedDescription:
In my farm in tamba��� city (rural zone of s���o paulo - brazil) i took a pic of the beautiful landscape, one week later i noticed a ufo when i was showing the pics to my friend. i will send 2 pictures, one of the ufo and another on that i took 1 minute before. pay atention to the color of the ground, the ufo pic has a purple light, stronger in the ground under the ufo, fading as it spreads. the other picture, that was taken 1 minute before, without any ufo, doesn't have any purple coloration. pay attention to the tree on the left, there is very few leaves, that is why the tree is so purple. the tree on the right has many leaves, blocking the purple light.

i didn't see anything while i was taking the picture, just took the pic and noticed the ufo 1 week later.

thanks !

fernando sobreira.
content.summary: Ufo picture.

content.detailedDescription: I was 11 years old. i was living at the bavarian apartments (building p) which was adjacent to a patch of woods which we always played in and rode our bikes/motorcyles in. one evening, three friends and myself were playing near the corner of the apartments (building p). we saw a glowing orange-yellowish ball come into our line of sight at a 45 degree angle. this object was moving at approximately 40-60 m.P.H. it came to a complete stop, hovering briefly above the tree tops of the woods, then desended straight down into the woods. the woods were glowing as it desended into the woods. i was in awe of this event. we each ran to our apartments and got flashlights. when we reasembled, the woods were dark. we entered the woods and followed trails to the center of the woods where we anticipated the object to be. we found nothing. we looked for scorched areas, broken tree limbs or disturbed patches of ground. we didn't find anything. we went back the following morning thinking we'd find something with the help of the sunlight. we couldn't find any clues. of course we were young and really didn't know what we were looking for other than physical proof. today, if you go to the same area you'll find that that patch of woods is now developed with housing. i am now 47 years old, and understand what we all saw that night was a special moment that few humans get to experience. and it's enough for me to know that i know...
content.summary: Ball of light descends at 45 degrees, stops, descends slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a humid night, not clear. you could see the moon and maybe one star.

i was in meridian hill park and saw a strange light moving slowly across the sky heading south. it abruptly turned left to the east then after a while appeared to be lowering, then the light went out. 

i couldnt tell how high up it was, but i dont thik it would be too high becasue you couldnt see anything else ecept the moon last night.

my friend who was with me had seen a diamond shaped ufo up close as a 10 year old and also seen others said "that's how they move".

it was strange, if anyknown has any info on what that might have been or if anyone else saw it, that would be great.
content.summary: A light like a planet on an overcast night moved across the sky, took a left and then lowered and went out.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, daughter, my daughter's boyfriend and myself were sitting in our backyard at 19:30 on may 27, 2009 when i noticed what looked like a black baloon at about 30 degrees in the northern sky.  i stood up and focused on the object and asked my daughter to run inside and get my binoculars. i wanted to confirm that the object was just a balloon. a few minutes later when i looked at the object thru the binoculars i could tell that this wasn't a balloon. the object appeared to have a body and wings, but not like any aircraft i've ever seen.  the edges of the object were fuzzy and appeared to be changing shape.  even when viewed through the binoculars, the object appeared small, and therefor, was very high up in the sky.

i asked my wife to get my digital camera, a cannon 7.1 mega pixel power shot.  i handed the binoculars to my daughter and quickly framed the object and started snapping photos.  i used two settings, auto and landscape, and zoomed to the max 4x on the landscape setting.

while i continued to snap pictures, my daughter kept an eye on the object through the binoculars.  she described what she was seeing as an object that was constantly changing shape and color.  the sun was low in the western sky, and the typical sunset / smog effect in the la area was causing the object to change colors from black to orange-red to silver.

within a few minutes, three other object appeared in the same area of the sky. the objects appeared to be slowly rising higher and moving towards the north, away from us.  the wind on the ground was maybe 5 mph blowing towards the south.  there were a few cirrostratus clouds and the objects appeared to be at about the same height.  our best guess was that the objects were at 20,000 to 30,000 feet.

our best guess was that the objects were about 15 miles to the north of us over the oak mountains, just to the east of rocketdyne which is located on the simi hills.

the objects appeared to be hovering in place for about twenty minutes with only minor movement.  based on the photos and the observations through the binoculars, we all thought the objects were rising and moving slowly to the north.

at 19:50 the objects just disappeared from our view.  we continued to watch for another 15 minutes, but didn't see anything else.

on a normal evening, we see commercial aircraft approaching the burbank airport.  the commercial aircraft are usually flying at 3,000 feet as they pass our vantage point, moving west to east.

i'm attaching three of the thirty photos i took to this report.  the first photo shows one dark object in the center of the frame and a commercial plane in the lower left.  the second shows three unidentified objects in the same frame.  the third shows two objects and a powerline in the foreground.

we are all certain that this was not a standard aircraft, neither private, military nor commercial.  this was not a balloon, star or planet.  there was no sound coming from the objects.  we had no sense that the objects were attached to each other or flying in a formation.

because of the height, it is impossible to say how large the objects were, but our best guess would be that they were larger than any standard commercial aircraft.  their movement, or lack of movement, indicates again that this was not a standard aircraft.
content.summary: Four unidentified chevron shaped objects were observed for twenty minutes over the mountains just to the north of the west side of the san fernando valley.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a humid night, not clear. you could see the moon and maybe one star.

i was in meridian hill park and saw a strange light moving slowly across the sky heading south. it abruptly turned left to the east then after a while appeared to be lowering, then the light went out. 

i couldnt tell how high up it was, but i dont thik it would be too high becasue you couldnt see anything else ecept the moon last night.

my friend who was with me had seen a diamond shaped ufo up close as a 10 year old and also seen others said "that's how they move".

it was strange, if anyknown has any info on what that might have been or if anyone else saw it, that would be great.
content.summary: A light like a planet on an overcast night moved accross the sky, took a left and then lowered and went out.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting around the camp fire there were 4 of us that saw this thing that looked like a star(no flashing lights as on a plane), it moved across the sky for about a min. than ziped off at what seemed like 10,000 mph in a blink of an eye, sorry i dont have a photo all i know is what we saw.
content.summary: Unknown star moves.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a white object that might have been a star in pure daylight. object might have been a very high altitude balloon but without the tear-drop shape. stationary. no movement at all. (could be a very bright star?) it's still there as i write this--about a third from the zenith facing west.

i was watering the lawn and happened to look up (at about 8:45 a.M. thursday morning). the sky was clear, no clouds. i saw a white object (not really shining at all) and it was just hanging there. about a week ago a nasa balloon passed over the region and i thought it was one of those again, but this was without the tear-drop shape--thus i wasn't all that excited. but through the binoculars it didn't reveal much more of a shape than a round object. it's still there as i write this.
content.summary: White round object (balloon?) over phoenix very high.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second day in a row this object just sat in the sky. i had taken pictures yesterday morning around 5am when i first noticed it.

 there is normally nothing in the sky at this position but i took pictures yesterday and did not use a tripod, therefore the photos were too bad to use, although i could tell the object was round.

i was surprised this morning when i came out to go to work and upon looking up at the same place in the sky it appeared in the same place as yesterday morning. 

i quickly got out the tripod and took some photos on my way to work.
the photo was taken looking just slightly east of due south. this object is very bright in the sky and most people would think it was a star unless you knew a star or planet does not appear at this location of the sky. i did not see the object move but if it did it moved very slowly.
i looked at this object with binoculars and could clearly see the round shape. 
should it still be in the same location tomorrow morning i will get more pictures of it.
content.summary: Bright light in sky-not a star-second day in row- [cms/tg/pid]

content.detailedDescription:
I'd left an evening service at o'brien baptist church to try to observe a satellite which was scheduled to pass over the area.  while seated in the back of the family car, i saw what appeared to be the expected satellite approach on a west to east trajectory.  

it was a point of light, about the same intensity as a star but not twinkling like the stars.  after a few seconds the light began to zigzag and move erratically.  it made 90 degree turns without slowing. and at other times the light stopped dead.  

no sound was apparent.

after about ten minutes, the 'craft' paused, then at speed even greater than before, it shot straight up and out of sight in less than one second.
content.summary: Point of light - fantastic movement.

content.detailedDescription:
Just watch sts 125 take off'' go to fuel tank droping to ind os''
at the 2.00 min mark there is a ufo '' hiding behind the tank
nasa has this film'' it came out about at the 2.00 min mark
just check it out
content.summary: Go to sts125  fuel tank.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my nephue were in our back yard looking thru the binoculars thats when i saw the object this is a follow-up of information i am sending to you. it did not resemble a plane. here are the photo's and video. my neice [cms/tg/pid] has had vivid nightmares about beings coming in there were two she first looked out side something gave her the chill something just didnt feel right. she told me that she couldnt move. her eye sight seem blured,she could not move. she also told she saw something out side and said the stars were formed in a pattern. her son said he heard something out the window also. she has had two vivid nightmares about the visitations. the other dream she said litte being came into her room she also could not move both her and her son were heald down on there beds then she told me that they were by the door before they left they let out a loud shreek. my neice can give you more iformation when the investigator comes out to talk to us as a family.

thank you. 
[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Me and my nephew took video and pictures.

content.detailedDescription: I was closing the blinds on my downstairs front that window looks south south east right off of hwy 12 in rincon valley. i turned the blinds up to close them and i noticed between two separate slats  a bright light as bright or brighter than venus standing still. i thought it was venus. it then started to move with what looked like a smaller less bright object behind it(the smaller one could have been a reflection). i then went out my front door to get a better look and did'nt see the smaller one anymore. the object was almost directly over me and i think bigger than venus moving south southeast slowly. it almost looked like an airplane when it has it's landing light on coming towards you but it started going away from me and it did'nt fade or pulse or start blinking. just a steady bright light not any further up than a plane unless it was huge?! it seemed to be moving slow at first and pretty much straight. i ran inside and called my wife and told her to look out the upstairs bedroom window by the time i came out it was further than i thought it would be by how slow it was moving. it had went from over me to the horizon to the south south east that i could see above the hoses across the way from me. my wife saw the bright light and said "what the hell?" it then kept moving in the same direction away from us and the just faded out to nothing. no blinking lights, no sound, nothing, almost instantly.. i don't think it was a plane, helicopter or sattelite.
content.summary: Bigger than venus bright white circle moving away from us

content.detailedDescription:
Several friends and were driving late one evening near the area of higginsville nova scotia. it was approximately 4am. there were four of us in the vehicle, i was in the passengers seat. the sky was very clear and crisp with no moon and i remember the start very bright.
as we neared a friends house where we were dropping them off, the driver was straining to look up over the stearing wheel into the sky. i first noticed the object as it was reflecting a very bright blue-green color off the hood of the car. as the driver instantly slowed the vehicle i looked out the window and up and saw directly over our vehicle a very bright blue green rectangle moving very slowly over our vehicle.
i would like to note at this point that the only way i can truly describe the color was that it had the same quality of something with a lot of electricity going through it, alternatingt in patches of blue green. i could also see that the blue green was only coming from the bottom surface of the object as i could make out against the blueish sky a jet black thickness above the object perhaps 10 feet high. like it was a flattened cube shape.
we stopped the vehicle and all jumped out of the car shocked. 
i can only estimate the size of the object. it appeared to pass over our vehicle at a height of only 100 feet or so and gave off a slight, almost inaudible, humming sound. i approximate the length at about 100-150 feet and the width approx 75-100 feet.
the object continued to "drift" slowly in a straight direction north and settled only about 1000 feet away from us before it came to a stop.
the object stayed exactly in that position for what seemed to be a long time but actually only approx 10 minutes.
during this time the object sat silently 100 feet or so above a farmhouse.
without warning, the blue-green bottom surface started to get brighter and then with a flash like a firework (i remember thinking) the object made a 2 point zigzag and moved at impossible speed over the horizon and dissappeared.
they were definately observing us for sure! something we all felt/knew.

i would like to note at this point a very odd coincidence. my older brother had a very similar sighting when he was quite young. his was a broad daylight sighting of a rectangular object over our family home. apparently i was there also but did not see it and do not have any recollection of this. i didnt really believe him for many years and wasnt really interested in the subject.
also, with no prior knowledge of this or my sighting, one of my friends confided with me years later that he and his girlfriend at the time had a nearly identicle sighting of a rectangular object in the same approximate area as mine and my brothers sighting.
since this sighting i have been actively researching any/all sightings that i can. for some time after my sighting my brin had a lot of difficulty processing what i had seen. if it wasnt for the three other individuals who all saw this object and the fact that it was so close i might have thought i was seeing things. but i know what i saw.
i has taken me some time get the nerve up to report this, but its as clear in my mind as if it happened yesterday.
i am an artist and have attached a rough digital sketch of the object.
content.summary: Very low pass and hover of a rectangular ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was watering the garden in the evening as usual, and i was scanning the sky and enjoying the fading light.  i remember the sky was completely clear and light blue. the sun was already down behind the mountain ridge.  as i was gazing up a bright orange cigar shaped object rapidly traveled across the sky from west to east.  the object was moving at an incredible speed- faster than anything i have ever seen, including satellites in orbit.  the object was a perfectly shaped ellipse with sharp well defined edges.  there was no contrail, nor any other visible disturbance in the sky.  there was no sound i could detect.  it was a very calm and quiet summer evening.  the object passed from horizon to horizon in about 5 seconds.  i neither saw nor heard any other aircraft before or after the event.  i had the impression the object was very large and traveling at a very high altitude- 15,000 to 20,000 feet or more.  i am an aircraft buff and routinely observe aircraft whenever they are overhead.  there is no possibility that this object was any conventional craft, at least one i am familiar with.  after the object passed from view i continued to watch the sky and wrap my brain around what i had just witnessed.  i finished watering the garden and went inside to tell every one what i had seen.  i said i had seen a ufo and the family thought that was neat.  the kids went outside hoping to see something too.  we did not witness any other events.
content.summary: Bright orange object flew from western horizon to eastern horizon at an incredible speed - no visible trail - definitely not an astronomical object.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting by the pool area in long pool chairs at the wynn casino looking at the sky as we were waiting to go to the airport to catch flight that left at 11pm.  i was looking up and thought i saw a shooting star then i look to the right and saw this red light dancing in the sky and the moves that it was doing were unbelievable.  it would basically zig zag up down all around instantly leaving some type of trail behind it .   i got out my camera and took video and my friend was able to snap some still photos.  i was in amazement and wish i had a better camera.  i lost sight when a commercial plane flew by over head which was landing at the airport close by.
content.summary: Red light making rapid change in direction over las vegas.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and 5 other individuals were out on the river in merrill wisconsin when one person notices a bright reddish-orange ball moving south in the sky across the skyline.  it was clearly not a airplane or anything of that sort because has a very clear solid glow with no blinking.  also, the object was close enough where there was no sound and it had very smooth movement.  

after the initial person noticed, several others viewed this object move above the trees probably a half mile away and when the object moved to the southwest of our position it changed direction suddenly and started moving east where it was not behind us.  initially viewing this from the bottom of the hill, we ran up the hill and saw the object directly above the treeline looking due south and the object stopped.  at this time i pulled out my camera phone to video the object, right after this, the object, which was approximately 1 to 2 miles in the distance, but maintaining the same shape and glow, appeared to slowly diminish.  it appeared as though it was moving away but to us viewers it was like the light turned off.  

one onlooker thought that the light at one point while it was moving from west to east, actually went east then back west then back east again before stopping and fading away.  we were all shocked by this and all believed we saw something that should be considered a ufo.  one of the viewers even stated in 20 years living here he'd never seen anything like that.

just to note, the object was definitely not a flare, firework or anything of that sort because the movement and the distance it traveled over several minutes was atleast 5 miles.

the video on my camera phone actually shows two lights which is definitely not what was seen with the naked eye.
content.summary: Round object moving in random directions ending in fade to nothing.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my sister jane have seen the same object go  over several nights in a row. and has been witnessed by several family members. the object always goes from west to east. the object has gone over our house several nights in a row. we like to go out at night and just look at the night sky and yes i know the difference between a satelite and a plane we live very near the airport. we are not looking for glam or glitter me and my family just wants to know whats this all about. i have never witnessed anything like this at night. something very strange is going on. it goes across between 9:45pm and 10:00pm and has done this for several nights. the object catches you off guard. the object goes in a straight line. is there anyone else reporting this object lots of people have to be seeing this object it catches your attention because of the brightness and intensity. me and my neice sara have also seen the same object from her house she lives about four houses down from me. i have video of the object but it was further away and was taken from my sisters camera. i continue to go out between 9:30pm and 9:45pm trying to get better video. the video i am sending is terrible like i said i dont have a great video recorder wish i did. the object this night was further away unfortunitly.I was not going to send this video because of the poor quality believe me this video dosent give it justice to how close the object has appeared.

thank you.
jeffrey and jane
content.summary: The object was very bright and quiet.

content.detailedDescription:
There seems to be a tilted disc shaped object with red to green lights very small, stationary 15 to 25 degrees or so above the horizon. around this object are numerous , sporadic flashes the size of stars bu the flashes are bright enough to attract the eye. these flashes are occuring below the red/green object. directly below it a series of 4 to 5 very bright and large flame colored lights appeared, lighting up in a random sequence with the last one flashing off to the north at an unbelieveable speed. this same type of formation-like brightllights occured again two more times, with the second time occurring further to the south and the third time occurring in between the first and second occurences.
the tilted disc object is the only object in question as to whether it is something totally unnatural to the eye or if it's the eye trying to focus on a planet. the other flashes and bright light formations were quite obvious and observed by several people on the beach.

my son saw the first formation and ran to tell me a half block from the ocean. i walked down and observed the other two occurences and all the flashes in the sky. we are near an airport but the airplanes were very easy to discern from the ufo activity. all the planes turned north away from the occurences.

i and everyone on the beach, about 8 people, were very excited. i believe i was screaming. the flashes stopped and after 20 or so minutes there were no more formations occuring. everyone had then left the beach so i left just for my own comfort.
content.summary: Off east coast  beach, numerous large yellow-orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work on state rt. 163 east bound, when about 4 miles out of town, i noticed these strange lights. now, working in aviation the last 8 years (i am not a pilot, but i have flown alot), i knew it didn't look like an aircraft, for some reason i thought it was a cell tower light. but then it hit me, there is only one light at the very top of those cell towers where i live. i have lived there my whole life. these lights were 2 very bright red blinking lights with a blueish faint light in the middle that just stayed on and didn't blink. at first, the 2 red lights were vertical of each other, then they kind moved aprt slightly horizontily. at this point, i knew i was seeing something very strange. thats when it hit me, this thing was right over genoa, like it was hovering, and i noticed the red strobe light on top of the water tower in genoa at the park. at this point, i was about 2 miles out from town still in the country. what i noticed, was that these lights were in between the water tower light and sr163. well, rushed into town and home and parked my truck. mind you, once in town you don't have a good view of anything in the sky do to the trees in town. so i rushed up on the roof to see if i could get a better look at this whatever it was. i got all the way up to the peak of the second story (very steep and painfull i might add)and i could see the lights which looked like they were just over the top of the north side of town. now, the red lights were now vertical again, and blinking very slowly and very brightly. the blueish whit light now turned into 2 lights of the same color very faint and very close together, with the trailing one being slightly lower than than the lead one. this is where things really got strange for me, the lights were moving at a snails pace, i was on that roof for 2 minutes, here's another kicker, no noise, none whatsoever, no prop noise, no jet noise no chopper noise, nothing, dead silence. i then imediatly jumped off the roof while it looked like it was still due north of me and jumped in my truck with my brother (he came out do to the noise of someone running around on the roof) and immediatly headed west out of town. i only live 4 blocks from the western edge of town, and one block north of sr163, it only took me 30 seconds to get back out in the open country fields. by the time i got out there, these lights were already miles away, but still very bright. maybe you guys can come up with an explanation.
content.summary: Strange light pattern, very bright, not like aircraft recognition lights.

content.detailedDescription: Approximently 1 am strange creatures approached and started singing strange songs. i wont even let the dogs out in the yard anymore. i am putting the house up for sale. these things got beamed up and stuff and then i ordered some pizza hut pizza mia, dude it was extra chessy , i got them for 5 dollars apeice and i got so full i took a nap at like the middle of the afternoon.
content.summary: I am still scared to go outside.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the clouds and i can see this object reflecting silver flash.
i run to take my cam (olimpus sp-500uz with default zoom). i made 4 pics with maximum zoom trying to maintain my hands pulse. i take first 2 in inside memory of the camera. i went to take xd card (near 20 seconds reseting the camera) and i can see the object starts to move. i think it could be with a speed near 300 km/h (need to calculate the cloud altitude to take this in reference). could be this a meteorological ballon? 

i didnt manipulate the pics with indicate circles to maintain them intacts. 

thanks and regards
content.summary: Strange circle over mexico city east 32000ft aprox, first quiet , later in move.

content.detailedDescription:
This event mostly took place after i had fallen asleep.  it seemed like i might be dreaming at the time, but later on, it became clear that i had not been.  
it started out that my husband and i were sitting on our bed, noticing this light flashing on and off.  during the "dream", we were trying not to notice it, but it was so bright, it was like all of the lights in the house had been turned on, and it was noon outside, even though it was actually well after sunset.  suddenly that scence disappeared, and i was laying on my right side, and my eyes were open, but i couldn't see anything except pure blackness and these 3 white lights that looked like stars, that were in the shape of an inverted triangle.  normally at night i can see a little bit in my bedroom, since our next door neighbor has a bug light.  i was not feeling frightened, just confused, until something moved in front of my face, and i couldn't see the lights anymore.  then i would start to hyperventilate because i was so afraid.  of what, i don't know, just being engulfed in blackness, with something i couldn't see.  this happened 3 or 4 more times, where i could see the lights, and then i couldn't.  by the last time, i think i might have passed out with fear.  
then i wake up, but not feeling like i was in a normal state of mind.  this time i could see around my bedroom.  i looked to my right, and i could see 2 people standing right next to my bed, who were definitely different from me.  they looked like lizard people.  immediately my first thought was that i was dreaming, so i wasn't at all frightened.  i decided to try to reach my arm up to the lamp next to the bed, and turn the light on, so i could wake up and then it would all go away.  i did raise my arm about half way to the light, and then my arm just went back down, without my control.  i was very confused by this, and not sure what to think.  they were looking very intently at me.  i got a very good look at them too.  they had these thin green masks on, that looked like they were made of green leather, that covered their noses and mouths.  they had 2 raised ridges on each side of the top of their heads.  their eyes were about the same size as ours, except they protruded farther out from their face than ours do.  their pupils were shaped like a cat's pupil. it was a gold color, the iris was black, and the rest of the eye beyond the iris was gold.  they had dark green, somewhat shiny skin, but kind of roughish in a way too, hard to describe.  there was a black emblem or ensignia of some kind on the right side of the chest on their clothing.  it was also a dark green color, tight fitting, looked like some kind of spandex material or something.  the one standing on the left, reached his right arm toward me and slid his index finger down the top of my left forearm.  i could feel this sensation physically.  his nail was like a short, pointed thick claw, of a grayish color.  after that, i blacked out, woke up hours later, and could smell a burning sulfur odor for about 15 seconds, and then it was gone.  i got up, just assuming it was a very strange dream, but then a few days later, the children mentioned seeing "green ghosts" in our room at night, touching our heads.  i hadn't mentioned the dream to anyone.  it was at that point that i started to question what might really be happening.
content.summary: Bright, blueish white light flashing on and off, over and over, from outside bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were coming out of our garage when we saw a very large and silent bright white glowing non pulsing, orb flying overhead going northwest to southeast.  it flew towards reno and when it hit this tiny puff of a cloud it disappeared.  it was just beautiful. the time is not exact but i remember the sun was not down enough that we could see stars.  we did see a low flying helicopter going over reno for a nice contrast.  this was the largest orb we've seen.
content.summary: Big bright orb...Again.

content.detailedDescription:
ok boys and girls, this is a good one.  so doug and i are in his backyard adjacent to the rockwoods state park at about 6:30 tue eve. and a contractor is doing some repair on his deck when i hear what sounds like a baby deer vocalizing for it's mother approx. 100 yards into the woods on the other side of the creek.  the contractor heard it as well and we talked about it having apparently lost it's mother.  doug and i went out to eat and came back about 3 hours later and we could still hear this baby crying in the woods.  doug metioned how he'd like to have a baby deer to raise so i took the flashlight and headed into the woods.  it just rained so the bank was muddy and sloppy but i half slid down to the creek and stepped on a large stone to jump across.  the opposite bank was steeper
and covered with short growth plants and small trees.  i scrambled up the bank and onto the first of several terraced flat areas and stopped to listen for the baby.  still not hearing i went further into the woods in the direction i had last heard it.  doug remained on the house side of the creek and he called out if that was humans talking. (later he said it sounded like kids giggling but very sinister) i said no (i didn't hear that part)and stood waiting for the baby to say something.  still no sound so i went another 50 yards to another creek all the while scanning the area with the rechargable spot light. i turned off the light to see if the baby would call out again but heard nothing.  still no sound so i turned the light on again which then rapidly faded out and was useless with no warning.  i could just make out the house lights through the trees but otherwise it was completely pitch black around me.  i gave up the search and was just starting to head back when i hear what sounded like a human pretending to whine like a puppy just inches from my right foot.  i could hear it rustle the leaves so i called out "come here boy, it's alright" but then it occurred to me that it did not sound like a real dog so i hurried to exit as quick as i could fighting through bushes and small trees dense enough to warrant breaking and plowing and i could hear the sound of the rustling leaves right behind me.  the two whines occurred again and this time it sounded like it was giggling as it made the sound.  right on my heels and keeping up with my speed.  i finally got back to the muddy creek bank and slid down it on my butt to the bottom (15 feet) and the whining sound happened again right from the edge i just slid down .  doug said, "i sounds like it's right behind you ".  i ran through the creek this time looking for the best slope to get me out the gully.  i took the lowest part (about 8 feet) and scrambled and clawed my way up the muddy bank and as i neared the top something flew right by my right ear making a strange whirling/giggling sound.  doug saw me come out of the gully and had full view of me while this happened.  he heard it but could see nothing. 
we both went up to the house, i breathing like i'd run a marathon.  the unmistakable feeling that this thing was "harassing" me was felt strongly by both of us.  it had chased me out of the woods and now on retrospect have to wonder if this wasn't a trap, make a sound like a baby deer, lure  the person into the woods and .....
it had 3 distinct and different vocalizations.  though it rustled the leaves was apparently invisible to the naked eye.

i've spent most of my adult life studying all aspects of scientific inquiry and my gut feeling was that was not normal.  doug is a well known wildlife veterinarian who could offer no reasonable explanation. it wasn't an animal.
content.summary: Chased from the woods by invisible entity

content.detailedDescription:
Looked up and saw an extremely large bird significantly higher then i have even seen military jets flying 

it wasn't a plane as it was flapping its wings
content.summary: White bird higher up then i have ever seen a plane

content.detailedDescription:
We were on vacation on tybee island which is straight east of savannah, georgia. we stayed on the 2nd floor which had an atlantic ocean view from patio doors in the living room.  there were no palm trees, etc., hiding any of the view of the sky or ocean. i woke up & walked into the living room on wednesday, may 20th at 1:50am. i sat on the sofa & was looking out the doors.  it was dark out of course but what i could see was this white object that was obviously too large to be a star.  i got out my binoculars for a closer look. it appeared to be shaped like a boomerang. i saw a red light flash twice on the ufo.  each flash wasn't in sequence. the object was still for several hours. (1:50am til around 6am)  around 6am, dawn was coming. the ufo very slowly moved upwards & to the east.  i was so excited to see this ufo!  it was the first time i could actually say i saw a real ufo.  when i first noticed this ufo, in 5 seconds time, i was trying to q rationalize that it was a commercial plane, then a helicopter. i knew what i was really seeing. 

the next morning, thursday, may 21st, around 4:30am, i woke up & again went straight to the living room to see if the ufo was in the sky.  it was. using my binoculars, it appeared to be the exact shape as the ufo seen the morning before. it was again in the same position.  i know this because of the distance from the top of the railing of the patio & the division of the doors. i also had someone else look this time & he agreed with me on the shape of the object. it was cloudy this night. i wasn't quite as excited this night.  i watched it til 6am then left the room. 

the following morning, may 22nd, 2009, around 4:30am, the ufo was again in the same position.  the difference this night was seeing 2 ships in the ocean that were quite a distance away to the human eye. the ships weren't directing below the ufo but to the north some.  the ships didn't move. there were very bright lights the length of both ships.  i had used my binoculars again to see the ships.

the ufo never showed up on saturday, may 23rd or sunday, may 24th.
content.summary: Ufo was still with one red light that flashed twice over a half hour period.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a beautiful clear black sky filled with millions of stars night as i sat on the edge of the lake sitting there relaxing and stargazing. i had been sitting out there for about a half on hour when these objects came into my view.

as i was sitting there to my right out from the tree line came 2 separte objects that looked like cresent moons chained to together. i believe each object was composed of 4 of these "moon" shapes. each moon shape was outlined in a bright almost neon sign red. in the middle of each moon shape was a bright pure white led type of light. these objects did not have any type of blinking or faa type lights or strobes. both of these objects were quite low like in a flight to the airport. just above the tree line. there was no noise at all.

as i sat there glued to my seat thinking and trying to make sense of what i was seeing - i then noticed that these objects were not flying like a regular aircraft -they seemed to be gliding with the 1 object leading and the other following close behind by  maybe a few hundred feet. then i thought maybe it was the space shuttle. it almost reminded me of that when we were able to see that a couple years ago from the ground. then i thought that theses objects were way to low to the ground to be the space shuttle. thats when i got alittle shaky in the knees and stood up.

when i stood up these 2 objects slowed down and stopped briefly over the lake . the 1st object flashed a white light to the other and they continued to glide on. as this happened. i saw a light just above me. i was the same type of object as over the lake but it was following over the trees on the bank of the lake. again, no noise.  this object was following in line is what it looked like with the two objects on the lake.

so now there were 3 identical objects i was following.  i made my way to the pier and went out and watched the objects. the two were still following eachother with the other object off the the side in tandem flying over the tree line. then i observed the two objects following  eachother stop as they got over the other side of the lake and stop dead. then the 1st lead object started going down. as it went down it turned into a single ball of orange light. then the second object that was following the first did the same. they became smaller and smaller in the sky to 2 points of faint orange pinpoints of light . i lost sight of the other 3rd object and can only say i saw it go in that direction over the tree line also. 

i keep watching as the pinpoints just stayed in the sky. i then kept looking around. i then saw a small ball of orange light come out of the sky over the farmers field from where the original two objects came from. this object was very tiny like a porch light. it did not have any other colors of light, strobes or anything. no noise and low. it just buzzed over the lake and went to meet the other 2 pinpoints of orange light.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 glowing red crescent shaped objects with white led insides turn into orange balls of light.

content.detailedDescription:
This text is to report a ufo event, that i experienced on the evening of monday, may  19th, 2009, in phoenix, arizona.
at approximately 7:30pm, i left a retail store, as i was walking to my car, i casually looked up to the sky to a location that was northwest of my vehicle.
(to possibly make this explanation easier, phoenix metro area is geographically arranged using a grid pattern., where all measurements and streets are laid out using north, south, east and west  as points of reference.)
the object i observe was again, northwest of my original position.
it first came to my attention because of it���s brightness. it was right at dusk and the sky was clear where i first observed it. there were small patches clouds  northeast of  the objects location..
this patch of clouds represented the leading edge of an emerging thunderstorm that was traveling, as a whole, in a southwesterly direction.
this made the object very easy to track because it was especially bright and it had a very definite diamond shape.
the storm cell was absolutely black in comparison to the area immediately behind the object.
i need to say that there is extensive aircraft traffic under the command of three faa controlled airspaces in this area, comprised of phoenix sky harbor international airport, scottsdale airport and deer valley airport, as well as, luke air force base, almost directly to the west
i���ve lived in metropolitan areas most of my life. 
in phoenix for nine years.
i���m very familiar with seeing all types of aircraft by sight,by sight,by movement, by location and by movement of safety equipment used by each, 
(such as takeoff and landing lights and safety strobes)
i did notice about three to five other groups of lights, but i quickly discounted them as conventional aircraft.
this object displayed none of those characteristics.
it did not move during the approx. twenty minutes of my observation.
it was a very bright single light, diamond shaped in it���s configuration. 
the light did not pulse, it did not vary in it���s brightness, it did not move, i could not hear any type of mechanical or electronic noises.
i had my cell phone with me that does have a camera feature. unfortunately, i could not capture an image, because it���s low pixel capability.
i drove further north to see if i could get in a better position to attempt to capture a digital image.
during this time i thought several times that i had lost observation of the object.
but i quickly realized that it was starting to be covered up by the thunderstorm that was continuing to move in a southwesterly direction. 
the clouds were actually passing in front of the diamond shaped object .
the object itself continued to remain stationary in it���s originally observed location. 
at one point, i pulled into a restaurant parking lot to make a final attempt at capturing an image with my cell phone.
there were three employees of the restaurant taking a��� smoke break.���
i walked over to them and asked if they could see the object i was tracking.
i pointed to it���s position in the sky and asked if they could see it.
all three immediately said that they could see the object and describe it���s shape, but could not offer an opinion as to what the object was.
i continued north and the object remained northwest and static in it���s position.
still wanting to capture some kind image, i pulled into another shopping plaza.
i went into a walgreen���s drug store at the southeast corner of e. tatum & e. thunderbird in scottsdale and asked for a one use digital camera. they were $20 for one with a good pixel density.
i wanted to warrant the expense so i went back outside to see if i could still see it.
unfortunately, in the interim, it had been completely covered by the storm cell that was continuing to the southwest.
this was approximately 7:50pm
i also noticed that the storm had started to show lightning flashes, as it intensified in strength.
after giving up the search, i continued traveling north towards my home and the storm started to sprinkle rain, strong enough to have to turn on my car rain wipers to the lowest intermittent setting for about 10 minutes..
i am sorry that i can only offer this as anecdotal evidence without an image to verify this sighting.
i do however state that this was a real event that was seen by me on the date and time i have indicated in this report.
content.summary: A motionless, bright white, diamond shaped object...

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the basketball game between cleveland and orlando and i decided to walk out the front door to look up in the sky! i noticed a star that seemed to be blinking in the northwest sky and then 3 roundlooking objects flew by, they did not have any lights or anything to make them noticable. the first object was followed by the other 2 and they seemed to be moving around one another. they were going too fast to be conventional aircraft! they were flying from north to south over the city of victoria texas. i tried to yell at my wife to come outside but she didn't hear me when i told her my story she laughed. this is the first time i've seen something like this. this sighting reminded me of the one they had in mexico that was reported by the military that's how fast these objects were moving approx. i watched them for a few seconds the trees blocked any further viewing! i did not bother to call the authorities because they'd laugh at me!
content.summary: Was looking at a star when all of a sudden 3 objects flew by!
